game.title: The Lost Village
game.objective: Find the lost village and bring back its ancient relic.
game.description: The villagers of Greenhill have gone missing, and their elder has asked for your help in finding them. Rumors point to a hidden village deep in the forest, where an ancient relic lies waiting to be discovered.

task.objective: Speak with the village elder in Greenhill Village.
task.description: Visit Elder Thorne and gather information about the lost village.

task.objective: Explore the forest and search for the hidden village.
task.description: Use your skills to navigate the treacherous terrain and find the entrance to the lost village.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the heart of the lost village.
task.description: Beware of any traps or guardians that may be protecting the relic. Bring it back to Elder Thorne for his reward and gratitude.
task.location: The Lost Village (deep in the forest)
